topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5455ba8963687260904e0100#post_5455ba8963687260904e0100
[bq="uc9"]"@Twisty":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5455b59d6368723452530000#post_5455b59d6368723452530000
[bq="Twisty"]i feel bad for saying this.

but goddamn if the flirty stuff isnt getting more annoying[/bq]
We feel the same way whenever shit posters don't stop and don't post any level of content or any actual discussion, but we don't say anything.
*cough* whenever you people just randomly shit up the thread without any level of discussion or telling non-fans about it and just assume everyone in the thread is already a fan then post five pages of nothing but macro images without any actual text or actually ask if anyone else is a fan or telling people why you like something
*cough*
*shots fired[/bq]


"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5455bb2563687219fca00200#post_5455bb2563687219fca00200
[bq="uc9"]"@Twisty":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5455b6f36368725a05be0200#post_5455b6f36368725a05be0200
[bq="Twisty"]the hate around the fandom revives around the fact it was created for nothing more than fanservice.

and around tumblr its probably the biggest most intrusive fandom of all, composed also of those teenagers with teen crushes for celebrities.

[/bq]
I don't hate homestuck I just hate how you and other homestuck fans just constantly shit up threads without actually telling us about homestuck or why you like it.  For a fandom that goes, "let me tell you about homestuck" you guys sure don't actually explain what homestuck is.

Like for example tell me what the story of homestuck is cause I don't know what it's about and maybe if it sounds interesting I would actually give it a chance instead of posting five pages of nothing but images.

1)What is homestuck?
2)What is the story?
3)Why do you like it?
4)Why should the other people in the thread give it a chance?[/bq]

who shit on your coffee this morning man?

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5455be236368726c59a90000#post_5455be236368726c59a90000
[bq="uc9"]

The reason why I'm being harsh is that homestuck fans are obnoxious cause they keep going, "let me tell you about homestuck" then post thousands of random images expecting for people to like it when non-fans have no context for it and thus don't understand what it is.

If someone would tell me something about why they like it then I would try it out, but posting random images going "why aren't these random images making you a fan already?" isn't going to get me to try it.

My problem with twisty and other homestuck fans is they smear thousands of images all over going, "be a fan already" and expect you to become a fan just by posting random images.  If I knew why people like homestuck then I would check it out.
[/bq]


i never asked you to be a fan nor anyone for that matter, nor i have posted millions of images telling everyone to become a fan, wtf is wrong with you?

the whole "let me tell you about homestuck" is nothing but a shitposty joke, one i have never in my life used.

wtf just happened? i was just playing payday now suddenly im being targeted.
